data.name: Therais Book
data.detailed_description:
THE GAME IS CURRENTLY NOT PLAYABLE ONLINE
IT WILL STAY THIS WAY UNTIL I RELEASE THE NEW/REBOOT-VERSION, WHICH WILL TAKE SOME TIME.
THERE WONT BE ANY SMALLER UPDATES UNTIL THEN EITHER.


Therais Book is an open world one-man-project MMORPG with unique items and rare drops, monsters and animals, pets, instances, and everything you need to have a good time, alone or with your friends. Form groups and guilds and tackle big bosses together.

Features:

->Multiplayer
‚Äì Playing together gives more experience to everyone on your team!
‚Äì PVP

>Guilds
‚Äì More features to guilds coming soon

>Pets
‚Äì Small, big, cute, horrifying: there‚Äôs something for everybody
‚Äì Pets fight by your side, level up, and get stronger.

>Open World
‚Äì Follow the Story or ‚Äúmake‚Äù your own, it‚Äôs an adventure either way.

>Rare and unique items
‚Äì Drop chances as low as 0.001% and Items that can only drop once. Try your luck!¬¥

>Bosses
‚Äì BIG EPIC BOSS FIGHTS üòÄ

Please be aware that this game is a one-man-project developed in my free time.

data.short_description: Therais Book is an open world one-man-project MMORPG with unique items and rare drops, monsters and animals, pets, instances, and everything you need to have a good time, alone or with your friends. Form groups and guilds and tackle big bosses together. Currently under development and in Alpha-Stage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quadcore Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest config for the lowest setting. This may change in the future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quadcore Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Debian 18
  • Processor: Dualcore 2GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Debian 20
  • Processor: Quadcore 2.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of violence in a fantasy setting.
